version.description: The version of the theme. Can be freely defined by the author, and is not used at the moment.

format.description: The theme format. This is a required property.

fragments.description: Path to fragments directory from theme root. Defaults to 'fragments'.

widgets.description: Path to widgets directory from theme root. Defaults to 'widgets'.

scripts.description: Path to scripts directory from theme root. Defaults to 'scripts'.
